text: Labo abathwele isihlalo sobukhosi kanye nalabo abasizungelezile, bagubha indumiso yeNkosi yakho futhi bakholelwa kuyona futhi bacelela labo abakholwayo intethelelo Nkosi yethu wengamele zonke izinto ngomusa nangolwazi ngakho-ke bathethelele labo abazisolayo futhi abalandela indlela yakho futhi baphephise esijezisweni sesihogo
